author: Fextralife
description:
Elden Ring Nightreign Gameplay Reaction - EVERYTHING WE KNOW SO FAR!
In this video, We will be taking a look at Elden Ring Nightreign. If you haven't heard during The Game Awards. FromSoftware and Bandai Namco unveiled that there's gonna be a standalone spin-off of Elden Ring that focuses on cooperative action-adventure play and in this video we'll go through everything we saw in the trailer and everything we know about it.

Elden Ring Wiki: https://eldenring.wiki.fextralife.com/Nightreign

Timestamp
0:00 - Elden Ring Nightreign Everything We Know
0:29 - Heavily Coop base
1:29 - Heroes Focused
2:41 - Game Structure
3:49 - The Nameless King
4:00 - Faster Movement
4:40 - Skills and Ultimate Skill
5:17 - Roguelike
6:04 - Itemization
6:38 - Not a Live Service Game
7:58 - Longevity and PvP
8:20 - 2025 Release
8:26 - Final Thoughts

Don't forget to like the video and subscribe to our channel for more!
Follow us on social media:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Fextralife/
Twitter: https:
title: Elden Ring Nightreign Gameplay Reaction - EVERYTHING WE KNOW SO FAR!
